articles.title: Astronomers say they’ve found the closest black hole to Earth - The Verge
articles.description: A team of astronomers at the European Southern Observatory in Chile say they have discovered the closest black hole to Earth, at a mere 1,000 light-years away. They inferred its existence based on the behavior of two weird stars orbiting around the black hole.
articles.content: Dont worry, its actually 1,000 light-years away
